backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, admin-restricted API key storage, and per-user session CRUD with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the Onebit app.
frontend/BUILD_NOTES.md: Build notes explaining deterministic behavior, optional LLM integration, storage model, demo mode, and export utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variants, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the Onebit app root and main TypeScript entry file.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing all flow steps, session state, theme, and initialization of client-side settings.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsDia: Admin-only dialog to manage API keys, LLM toggle, and landing page content with local state and store hooks.
frontend/src/components/ApiKeyDialog.tsx: Simple admin dialog for viewing API key status and saving or clearing the OpenAI API key.
frontend/src/demo/demoSessions.ts: Provides static demo session data mimicking stored session history.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: Custom countdown timer hook with start, pause, reset, and formatted time output.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for sessions, API keys, admin checks, and AI task generation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a full theme with color variables, light/dark modes, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ActionModePage.tsx: Renders the action focus view with a countdown timer and controls for start, pause, reset, and check-in.
frontend/src/pages/CheckInPage.tsx: Displays outcome options for a completed session and reports the selected result.
frontend/src/pages/ContextPage.tsx: Collects the user’s blocker and available time using radio selections before advancing.
Runs deterministic focus compression, shows the chosen action and fallback, and proceeds after user confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Loads and displays past sessions with optional demo mode, sync toggle, and text export.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page showing logo, pitch, optional demo video, and buttons to start, view history, or toggle demo mode.
frontend/src/pages/MentalDumpPage.tsx: Page for users to enter a list of thoughts and proceed or go back in the workflow.
frontend/src/pages/RecoveryPage.tsx: Generates and displays deterministic recovery steps based on session outcome, with options to continue or end the session.
frontend/src/pages/SessionEndPage.tsx: Final page that saves the completed session and offers navigation to view history.
frontend/src/store/adminSettings.ts: Stores and retrieves admin settings such as LLM enablement, demo video link, and pitch text using localStorage.
frontend/src/store/demoMode.ts: Handles enabling, disabling, and loading demo mode via localStorage.
frontend/src/store/sessionStore.ts: Manages session drafts and completed session history in localStorage, keeping up to 50 sessions.
frontend/src/store/syncSettings.ts: Stores and manages sync enablement state in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/deterministicFocusCom: Compresses user text into a single actionable task using heuristics and time estimates.
frontend/src/utils/deterministicRecovery: Generates deterministic recovery messages and micro‑steps based on the task and outcome.
frontend/src/utils/exportSessionsTxt.ts: Builds a formatted text report for all stored sessions and triggers a client-side download as a .txt file.
frontend/src/utils/llmOutputPolicy.ts: Cleans and validates LLM output by removing disallowed patterns, enforcing one-sentence limits, and rejecting non-actionable text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores the current project state, feature definitions, and high-level product requirements for the Onebit rebuild.
